author: cmpilato
msg: Heavily cleanup and rework svndumpfilter.  I simply can't bear to look
at it any longer.  This patch includes:
- support for --quiet (the default is insanely chatty)
- a bugfix related to copyfrom source paths
(new_node_record): Check the prefix list (instead of the dropped
nodes list) for invalid copyfrom source paths.
(do_filter): New, combined guts of subcommand_include() and
subcommand_exclude()).  Now, do the reporting here instead of in
array and hash table dump routines.
(parse_baton_initialize): Track baton mods in this init function.

author: sussman
msg: * STATUS:  vote for some docfixes to static C strings.

author: breser
msg: STATUS: Add r8678 as a 1.0.1 canidate.
